zellij.strategies.utils package

Submodules

zellij.strategies.utils.chaos_map module

class zellij.strategies.utils.chaos_map.Chaos_map(name, level, dimension, map_kwargs=None)

Bases: object

Chaos_map Global search

Chaos_map is used to build the chaotic map according to the give name, the level and dimensions of the Searchspace. See Chaotic_optimization for more info. Th chaotic map is matrix of shape: (level, dimension).

level

Chaotic level corresponds to the number of iteration of the chaotic map

Type

int

dimension

Dimension of the Searchspace.

Type

int

map_kwargs

Keyword arguments associated to the selected map.

Type

dict

map

Contains the chaotic map of size level*dimension.

Type

np.array(dtype=np.array(dtype=float))

__init__(self, name, level, dimension, map_kwargs=None)

Initializes Chaos_map

See also

Chaotic_optimization

Chaos map is used here.
